id: Student planner - Notion template | Classes, Assignments, tasks & notes
name: Student planner - Notion template | Classes, Assignments, tasks & notes
description: The Student Planner is a streamlined Notion template designed to help students effortlessly manage their academic life.This template includes organized sections for Classes, Assignments, Tasks, and Notes, making it ideal for students who want a no-fuss approach to staying on top of their coursework and deadlines. This template is perfect for high school and college students looking for an easy way to keep their studies organized and manageable.
